sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify' import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css' import firebaseDB from './firebase' import './App.scss' function App() { const [state, setState] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }) const { name, email, subject, message } = state const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (!name || !email || !subject || !message) { toast.error(' Keyboard not found. Press a button on the non-existent keyboard to fix it.Kidding üòÇ Please provide value in each input field to reach us') } else { firebaseDB.child('contacts').push(state) setState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }) toast.success('Form Submitted Successfully‚úÖ. you just dropped love‚ù§Ô∏è. We will get back to you within 24 hours‚è≤Ô∏è') } } const handleInputChange = (e) => { let { name, value } = e.target setState({ ...state, [name]: value }) } return (

You can write‚úçÔ∏è us hereüìù!

Contact us

I am interested in freelance opportunities However, if you have other request or question, don't hesitate to contact me using below form either.

Address: 91 New Balbhadrapur, shivsagar, Darbhanga, 846001

Phone: +91 8240169006

Twitter: @Abhinav95970320

LinkedIn: Abhinav Kumar

) } export default App
